WRITING.TEXT: What's poor Keanu got to do with it?
What's the deal with living in Hove? Non-Brit here
When did hey say he's from Brighton?
I still can't get around thinking that those who use it are really selfish. It's just my experience.
He was 16 and made a 13 year old girl blow him. He also commanded her around, telling her how to dress and such.

WRITING.TITLE: The 12g Automatic
WRITING.TEXT: Does anyone actually use this gun, any version of it? I've almost never been killed by it ans using it really feels inferior to the Trench Gun and the 10-A in basically every aspect. Does it have any advantage I'm unaware of?

In Operations and also Rush, I only really despise them when we're attacking. The defenders have unlimited respawns, why do you bother? Then again, as a defender, they can be really useful as long as it's not half the team.
